description: 35 Egyptian-themed affixes for PoE2-style random stat generation

affixes.name: of Anubis' Judgment
affixes.description: Carries the weight of divine judgment
affixes.lore: Marked by the scales of judgment, your strikes now carry divine authority.

affixes.name: of Ra's Radiance
affixes.description: Glows with the sun god's eternal light
affixes.lore: Infused with the burning light of Ra, scorching all within your divine presence.

affixes.name: of Thoth's Multitude
affixes.description: Channels the wisdom of infinite forms
affixes.lore: The wisdom of Thoth multiplies your projectiles, each carrying ancient knowledge.

affixes.name: of Horus' Precision
affixes.description: Sees through the eye of the falcon god
affixes.lore: The falcon's eye guides your strikes to their most vulnerable points.

affixes.name: of Isis' Restoration
affixes.description: Carries the healing tears of the goddess
affixes.lore: Blessed by Isis' tears, your wounds mend with divine restorative power.

affixes.name: of Set's Fury
affixes.description: Channels the storm god's destructive rage
affixes.lore: The fury of Set hurls your enemies away like leaves in a desert storm.

affixes.name: of Bastet's Fortune
affixes.description: Blessed by the cat goddess of prosperity
affixes.lore: Bastet's feline grace ensures treasures find their way to your hands.

affixes.name: of Maat's Balance
affixes.description: Maintains perfect harmony with the universe
affixes.lore: Balanced by Maat's feather, all your powers flow in perfect harmony.

affixes.name: of Ammit's Hunger
affixes.description: Devours the life force of the unworthy
affixes.lore: Ammit's endless hunger turns your enemies' life force into your sustenance.

affixes.name: of Khepri's Endurance
affixes.description: Carries the scarab's eternal momentum
affixes.lore: Fueled by the scarab's eternal cycle, you move with unstoppable momentum.

affixes.name: of Osiris' Might
affixes.description: Wields the resurrected god's immense power
affixes.lore: Osiris' resurrection grants you power that transcends death itself.

affixes.name: of Nephthys' Shadow
affixes.description: Moves unseen through the shadows of night
affixes.lore: Nephthys' shadows guide your projectiles with swift, unseen precision.

affixes.name: of Ptah's Creation
affixes.description: Forged by the god of craftsmen
affixes.lore: Crafted by Ptah's divine hands, your attacks flow with masterful precision.

affixes.name: of Sobek's Flood
affixes.description: Crashes with the crocodile god's mighty waters
affixes.lore: Sobek's flooding Nile grants you the resilience of ancient waters.

affixes.name: of Hathor's Joy
affixes.description: Filled with the goddess of music and dance
affixes.lore: Hathor's joyful melodies accelerate your journey toward enlightenment.

affixes.name: of Geb's Earth
affixes.description: Grounded in the earth god's solid foundation
affixes.lore: Geb's earthen strength anchors your enemies in unyielding ground.

affixes.name: of Nut's Stars
affixes.description: Twinkles with the sky goddess's celestial light
affixes.lore: Nut's starlight amplifies your critical strikes with celestial power.

affixes.name: of Montu's Warrior
affixes.description: Blessed by the falcon-headed war god
affixes.lore: Montu's warrior spirit fills your strikes with the fury of divine combat.

affixes.name: of Serket's Venom
affixes.description: Drips with the scorpion goddess's deadly poison
affixes.lore: Serket's venom courses through your weapon, siphoning life from the afflicted.

affixes.name: of Wepwawet's Path
affixes.description: Guides the way for the wolf god of war
affixes.lore: Wepwawet's wolfen guidance carries you swiftly along the path of victory.

affixes.name: of Meretseger's Protection
affixes.description: Guarded by the cobra goddess of silence
affixes.lore: Meretseger's silent protection mends your wounds with cobra-like vigilance.

affixes.name: of Apophis' Chaos
affixes.description: Writhing with the serpent of chaos's destructive power
affixes.lore: Apophis' chaotic essence erupts in waves of destructive, serpentine fury.

affixes.name: of Shu's Wind
affixes.description: Carried by the god of air's gentle breeze
affixes.lore: Shu's winds propel your projectiles with the speed of desert gales.

affixes.name: of Taweret's Fertility
affixes.description: Blessed by the hippopotamus goddess of childbirth
affixes.lore: Taweret's fertile essence grants you the vitality of new life itself.

affixes.name: of Bes' Protection
affixes.description: Warded by the dwarf god's fierce guardianship
affixes.lore: Bes' protective wards enhance all your divine abilities with fierce determination.

affixes.name: of Khnum's Shaping
affixes.description: Molded by the ram-headed potter god
affixes.lore: Khnum's skilled hands shape your attacks with masterful, flowing precision.

affixes.name: of Anqet's Flood
affixes.description: Empowered by the gazelle goddess's nourishing waters
affixes.lore: Anqet's flooding waters bring forth treasures from the depths of the Nile.

affixes.name: of Heqet's Life
affixes.description: Croaks with the frog goddess's life-giving power
affixes.lore: Heqet's life essence accelerates your growth toward divine ascension.

affixes.name: of Meskhenet's Destiny
affixes.description: Marked by the birth goddess's predetermined fate
affixes.lore: Meskhenet's predetermined fate ensures your critical strikes are written in the stars.

affixes.name: of Nefertum's Lotus
affixes.description: Blooms with the lotus god's healing fragrance
affixes.lore: Nefertum's lotus blooms restore your vitality with fragrant, divine healing.

affixes.name: of Renenutet's Prosperity
affixes.description: Ripens with the snake goddess's bountiful harvest
affixes.lore: Renenutet's harvest blessings ensure bountiful rewards for your victories.

affixes.name: of Shay's Fate
affixes.description: Destined by the god of destiny's unyielding will
affixes.lore: Shay's destiny weaves your powers together in perfect, fated harmony.

affixes.name: of Tenenet's Renewal
affixes.description: Cycles with the date palm goddess's eternal rebirth
affixes.lore: Tenenet's renewal cycles grant you the enduring momentum of eternal rebirth.

affixes.name: of Wadjet's Protection
affixes.description: Coiled with the cobra goddess's royal protection
affixes.lore: Wadjet's royal protection coils around you like a crown of living defense.

affixes.name: of Weneg's Joy
affixes.description: Rejoices with the shark god's ecstatic pleasure
affixes.lore: Weneg's ecstatic joy accelerates your journey with blissful, divine speed.
